Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the transfer of reserves between public employee retirement systems of the state
Summary: Provides for transfers from the MTA police retirement program to certain other retirement systems or funds.
LawCode: Amd ยง343, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, relating to the transfer of reserves between public employee retirement systems of the state
